original_text: And one of the elders answered, saying unto me, What are these which are arrayed in white robes? and whence came they?
korean_text: 장로 중 하나가 응답하여 나에게 이르되 이 흰 옷 입은 자들이 누구며 또 어디서 왔느냐

sentences.original_text: And one of the elders answered
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 장로 중 한 사람이 대답하여

sentences.original_text: What are these which are arrayed in white robes?
